meanings.definition: The action or process of adapting together.
meanings.sent1: The coadaptations of the plants and animals in the ecosystem ensure their survival.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the coadaptations between different species to understand their relationships.
meanings.sent3: The coadaptations between the chef and the kitchen appliances made cooking look like a dance.
meanings.sent4: The coadaptations of the team members were so seamless, they worked together like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The coadaptations of the puzzle pieces made it easy to fit them together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The state of being adapted together.
meanings.sent1: The coadaptations of the organisms in the environment create a balanced ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The coadaptations of the different parts of the machine ensure its smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: The coadaptations of the siblings in the family led to a harmonious household.
meanings.sent4: The coadaptations of the colors in the painting gave it a cohesive and pleasing look.
meanings.sent5: The coadaptations of the gears in the clock kept perfect time.
